summary:
The new female-body replacer was merely intended to make a process of migration from UNPB-BBP/HDT-PE to UNPB HDT-SMP(Skinned Mesh Physics) as easy and smooth as possible.
Limited support for old UNPB & UUNP armor (no collision, BBP/TBBP/.. when that support was available).
descriptionHtml:
Description
-------------
The new female-body replacer was merely intended to make a process of migration from UNPB-BBP/HDT-PE to UNPB HDT-SMP(Skinned Mesh Physics) as easy and smooth as possible.
UNPB Classic (HDT-SMP vers) body similar to UNPB v2-2/v2-4 & UUNP->UNPB(BreastGravity 30%).
Limited support for old UNPB & UUNP armor (no collision, BBP/TBBP/.. when that support was available).

[i]Incompatibilities: [/i]HDT-PE if using it for the same thing as SMP (some hair HDT-PE).

-----
Version 1.1 Release Notes:
animation fix (runbackward, runbackwardleft, runbackwardright)

Requirements
-------------
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim v.1.9.32.0.* (non-SE)
SKSE: [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]
XPMSE (select BBP): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/[/url]

Installation
-------------

00
-----
Back-up folders located in:
Data\skse
Data\meshes\actors\character\character assets
Data\meshes\actors\character\animations
Data\textures\actors\character

10 - Binarys
-----
HDT-PE (Physics Extensions) & HDT-SMP (Skinned Mesh Physics).
Overwrite any existing .xml files.

20 - XMLS or XMLS EU
-----
Choose your keyboard layout. 
XMLS EU (European layout): float values in xmls - ","
XMLS: float values in xmls - "."
You will know if you choose the wrong if you dont have physics and the logs tells you : not a float value!

30 - Shapes
-----
Meshes: femalebody, femalefeet, femalehands.

40 - Head & Textures
-----
Head: Pretty Face (fix & retexture). Textures FSC 6.0 (some retexture body).
Or use any compatible solution for UNP.

50 - Animation (idle-walk-run-sprint-swim)
-----
VHH + files with unknown source.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks to 

Dimon99
DIMONIZED UNP female body: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709﻿/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709﻿/[/url]

xp32
Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13272﻿/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13272﻿/[/url]

tktk
Pretty Face: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/[/url]

HHaleyy
Fair Skin Complexion: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/[/url]

HydrogensaysHDT
Skinned Mesh Physics: [url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4497700-1-1.html]http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4497700-1-1.html[/url]
HDT Physics Extensions: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
